data.quote: If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving isn't for you.
data.author: Steven Wright

data.quote: I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
data.author: Groucho Marx

data.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: If you don't know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.
data.author: Yogi Berra

data.quote: There was a child so lovely but his mother was glad to get him to asleep
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Austrailia.
data.author: Charles Schulz
